name: Monique Brignoni
what_you_do: Animalchemy offers pet end-of-life support, coaching, and conscious journeys to help pet owners transform their grief into peace.
who_you_serve: Animalchemy serves pet owners, particularly those dealing with the loss of a pet or seeking to deepen their connection with their animals.
signature_programs: Transform Grief into Peace Course, Sacred Death Pet Doula training
current_projects: Free Peaceful Pet Discovery Session, Free Sacred Pet Death Doula Discovery Session
bio: Monique Brignoni has received testimonials for her life-changing mentoring and masterclasses.
